Submitter Information: Shenzhen Mindray Bio-medical Electronics Co., LTD
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for the BS-400/CLC 720 Chemistry Analyzer, an automated clinical chemistry analyzer with optional ISE module for quantification of glucose and electrolytes in serum, plasma, urine, and CSF.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for direct quantitative measurements of sodium, potassium, and chloride in serum, plasma, and urine and glucose in serum, plasma, and urine; aids diagnosis and monitoring of electrolyte and metabolic disorders and carbohydrate metabolism diseases including diabetes.
